attributes.action: Recognise all British citizens aged 70 as Jubilee Babies.
attributes.additional_details: This will be the last opportunity for us, those born in 1952, to be recognised as part of the Jubilee celebration of Her Majesty The Queen. It is possible all of us aged 70 in 2022, would have made valuable contribution to the Crown, The Country, The economy and to the British Empire/Commonwealth and for this reason, should be entitled to some sort of recognition, especially in this, the year of the Queen's Jubilee, bearing in mind, there will not be another Platinum Jubilee of HM The Queen.
attributes.background: Parliament to beseech HM The Queen to recognise all those British subjects born in the year of her Coronation

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure what action you'd like the Government to take to 'recognise' Jubilee babies. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
